question: Robot 1 is in (1,1) position. It sees a blue bottle in (5,8) position with “NF” written in handwriting. R1 has to tell the owner's name. Who is the owner?
The Robot R2 sees a cup which is red in color as well as a plastic cup. But it couldn’t locate the unique feature. Where can it find the unique feature?
If R1 wants to reach C1, which side should it move first?
R1 is currently at position (1,1) and sees a clear bottle with a “SH” logo at position (7,6). Who is the owner of this bottle?
R2 is at position (7,9) and needs to reach B2 (Bottle 2) at (5,8). What direction should R2 move first?
